text:
Backup units make a chain attack in 
the combat of an ally fighting a foe 
in range.

Covert units double their Avo bonus 
from terrain effects.

Dragon units gain additional effects 
when engaged with Emblems.

Flying units ignore all terrain effects, 
even passing through squares of 
empty sky.

Armored units ignore break effects 
from weapon advantage.

Cavalry units have higher movement 
than other units.

Mystical units ignore opponents' 
Avo bonuses from terrain when 
attacking with magic.

Civilian units do not have any 
special advantages in battle.

Qi adept units can use the Chain 
Guard command to redirect attacks 
on adjacent allies to themselves.
